root.name: Axis & Allies
root.description: Axis Allies is a PC strategy game based upon the popular board game. AA combines both real-time and turn-based strategy elements into one giant managing system. The game features three modes of play: World War Mode- An open-ended game where the player chooses a side (Axis or Allies) and attempts to eleminate the opposing faction. The game is managed through a map of the world which plays out in turns. After every turn the player fights small scale battles in an RTS style of play. Campaign- You select your nation and leader and begin to play out WWII. This mode uses the same play styles of World War Mode. Skirmish- In skirmish you fight small to medium scale RTS battles without the Turn-Based map element. Similar rules are applied to multiplayer matches.
